check.title: BetterThanDollar: Unlock the next evolution of price stability in DeFi

subheading.a:
Unlock the next evolution of price stability in DeFi.
BetterThanDollar, censorship-resistant and with sustainable rewards
subheading.b:
Unlock the next evolution of DeFi
decentralized, non-custodial savings and rewards

subheading.a: People moving forward to next-gen price stability

heading.head: Three steps to boost your rewards

details.a: The sooner you join, the more your rewards will get boosted!
details.b: Complete the three steps in the box
details.d: BetterThanDollar launches, you will accumulate your boosted rewards simply by holding and sending the new super-token.
details.e: In the next phase claim the rewards in the wallet you connect here.

rewardProgram.heading: Join the BetterThanDollar reward program:

post.text: Make a post on your X and share the word:

verify.placeholder: Verify the link to your shared tweet:

sign.text: Connect your wallet on ethereum and sign:

rewardProgram.footer:
Sign the message to confirm eligibility.
Your connected wallet will qualify to claim boosted BetterThanDollar rewards.

information.a: On blockchains, more than 99% of stablecoins are pegged to the US dollar, despite less than 10% of all users being from the USA. This leaves more than 90% of users worldwide vulnerable to the wild fluctuations in the dollar relative to their local currencies.
information.b: What do you believe is the most important feature for a new super-stable token to be better than the dollar? Is it that:

list.a: It offers BETTER PRICE STABILITY to your national currency than US$-reference tokens
list.b: The better STABILITY IS SHARED AMONG ITS USERS benefitting everyone and... not only one small group (one country) enjoys all the benefits
list.c: It provides CENSORSHIP RESISTANCE unlike traditional dollar-referenced tokens
list.d: It is a NEUTRAL BLOCKCHAIN NATIVE SOLUTION that does not just refer to an old-fashioned fiat currency and its related politics.

information.c: Click on your choice to the right and share it on X
